title: Mary Hopkin - Post Card (1969/2010) [FLAC]
description:
Mary Hopkin - Post Card (1969/2010) [FLAC]

Genre: Welsh, Folk, Pop

Tracklist:
1. Those Were The Days (2010 Remaster)
2. Lord Of The Reedy River (2010 Remaster)
3. Happiness Runs (Pebble And The Man) (2010 Remaster)
4. Love Is The Sweetest Thing (2010 Remaster)
5. Y Blodyn Gwyn (2010 Remaster)
6. The Honeymoon Song (2010 Remaster)
7. The Puppy Song (2010 Remaster)
8. Inch Worm (2010 Remaster)
9. Voyage Of The Moon (2010 Remaster)
10. Lullaby Of The Leaves (2010 Remaster)
11. Young Love (2010 Remaster)
12. Someone To Watch Over Me (2010 Remaster)
13. Prince En Avignon (2010 Remaster)
14. The Game (2010 Remaster)
15. There s No Business Like Show Business (Annie Get Your Gun, Act 1) (2010 Remaster)
16. Turn Turn Turn (To Everything There Is A Season) (2010 Remaster)
17. Goodbye (2010 Remaster)
18. Sparrow (2010 Remaster)
19. Fields Of St. Etienne (Previously Unreleased)

Mary Hopkin's debut is a treasury of popular song. Produced by Paul McCartney and featuring numbers from Donovan, Harry Nilsson and, in rare songwriting mode, George Martin; plus classics from the Gershwins and Irving Berlin. Mary's pure, folk-inspired vocals make for a beguiling, dreamy album.
